MeasurementToolMetadata.Description: Parent survey about their child's home activities and cognitive stimulation. The survey is given to parents prior to first study visit since a child is 7 years old
MeasurementToolMetadata.Citation: Adapted from first fall and third spring grade parent interviews. Manual is from Tourangeau, K., Nord, C., LÃª, T., Sorongon, A. G., & Najarian, M. (2009). Early Childhood Longitudinal Study, Kindergarten Class of 1998-99 (ECLS-K): Combined User's Manual for the ECLS-K Eighth-Grade and K-8 Full Sample Data Files and Electronic Codebooks. NCES 2009-004. National Center for Education Statistics.

weekly_child_activities_1.Description: In a typical week, how often do you or any other family members do the following things with your child? Selected: Tell stories to your child.

weekly_child_activities_2.Description: In a typical week, how often do you or any other family members do the following things with your child? Selected: Help your child do arts and crafts.

weekly_child_activities_3.Description: In a typical week, how often do you or any other family members do the following things with your child? Selected: Play games or do puzzles with your child.

weekly_child_activities_4.Description: In a typical week, how often do you or any other family members do the following things with your child? Selected: Talk about nature or do science projects with your child.

weekly_child_activities_5.Description: In a typical week, how often do you or any other family members do the following things with your child? Selected: Play a sports or exercise together.

weekly_child_activities_6.Description: In a typical week, how often do you or any other family members do the following things with your child? Selected: Practice reading, writing or working with numbers.

weekly_child_activities_7.Description: In a typical week, how often do you or any other family members do the following things with your child? Selected: read books to your child.

weekly_child_activities_8.Description: In a typical week, how often do you or any other family members do the following things with your child? Selected: read books to your child in English.

past_month_child_activities_1.Description: In the past month, has anyone in your family done the following things with your child? Selected: Visited a library or bookstore.

past_month_child_activities_2.Description: In the past month, has anyone in your family done the following things with your child? Selected: Gone to a play, concert, or other live show.

past_month_child_activities_3.Description: In the past month, has anyone in your family done the following things with your child? Selected: Visited an art gallery, museum, or historical site.

past_month_child_activities_4.Description: In the past month, has anyone in your family done the following things with your child? Selected: Visited a zoo, aquarium, or petting farm.

past_month_child_activities_5.Description: In the past month, has anyone in your family done the following things with your child? Selected: Attended an athletic or sporting event in which your child was not a player.

past_week_child_reading.Description: In the past week, how often did your child read to himself/herself or to others outside of school?

time_spent_reading.Description: Generally, how long did your child read to himself/herself at each of these times? (in minutes)

child_electronic_device.Description: Do you have a home computer or other electronic device that your child uses?

child_electronic_device_usage.Description: In an average week, how often does your child use the computer or other electronic device to play with programs that teach him/her something, like math or reading skills? Would you say...

child_electronic_device_internet.Description: Does your child use the computer or other electronic device to get on the Internet?

outside_school_activities_1.Description: Outside of school hours in the past year, has your child participated in: Selected: Academic activities, like science, computers, math lab, or taking a class to learn a language other than English?

outside_school_activities_2.Description: Outside of school hours in the past year, has your child participated in: Selected: Organized athletic activities, like basketball, soccer, baseball, or gymnastics?

outside_school_activities_3.Description: Outside of school hours in the past year, has your child participated in: Selected: Organized clubs or recreational programs, like scouts?

outside_school_activities_4.Description: Outside of school hours in the past year, has your child participated in: Selected: Music lessons, for example, piano, instrumental music, or singing lessons?

outside_school_activities_5.Description: Outside of school hours in the past year, has your child participated in: Selected: Drama classes?

outside_school_activities_6.Description: Outside of school hours in the past year, has your child participated in: Selected: Art classes or lessons, for example, painting, drawing, or sculpture?

outside_school_activities_7.Description: Outside of school hours in the past year, has your child participated in: Selected: Organized performing arts programs, such as children's choirs, dance programs, or theater performances?

outside_school_activities_8.Description: Outside of school hours in the past year, has your child participated in: Selected: Religious activities or instruction?

outside_school_activities_9.Description: Outside of school hours in the past year, has your child participated in: Selected: Did your child's participation in any of the activities above help to cover the hours when you needed adult supervision for him/her?

family_meals.Description: In a typical week, please tell me the number of days your family eats the evening meal together.

child_tutoring.Description: Is your child tutored on a regular basis, by someone other than you or a family member, in a specific subject, such as reading, math, science, or a foreign language?

child_tutoring_subject.Description: What is your child tutored in? (Check all that apply)

family_help_with_art.Description: How often does your child get help by you or any other family member with his/her reading, langauage, arts, or spelling homework?

Levels.2: Once or twice times a week

family_help_with_science.Description: How often does your child get help by you or any other family member with his/her math or science homework?

Levels.2: Once or twice times a week

time_do_homework.Description: Approximately, how much time is set aside every week for your child to do homework?

newspaper_have.Description: Which of the following items does your family have in home: newspaper?

magazine_have.Description: Which of the following items does your family have in home: magazine?

dictionary_encyclopedia_have.Description: Which of the following items does your family have in home: dictionary or an encyclopedia?

pocket_calculator_have.Description: Which of the following items does your family have in home: pocket calculator?

children_book_at_home.Description: How many childen's books does your child have in your home now, including library books

newspapers_or_magazines_read.Description: Now we would like to know what you read at home. How often do you read the following items at home: Newspapers or magazines?

books_read.Description: Now we would like to know what you read at home. How often do you read the following items at home: books?

letters_notes_emails_read.Description: Now we would like to know what you read at home. How often do you read the following items at home: letters, notes, and emails?

internet_webpages_read.Description: Now we would like to know what you read at home. How often do you read the following items at home: internet or web pages?
